articles.description: BLACKSBURG, Va. (WFXR) — Whether you’re planning to spend your summer at the beach, hiking through state parks, gardening in your yard, or grilling outside, make sure you take the proper precautions to protect your skin from the sun’s UV rays. Dr. Mariana Phi…
